neighbors.name: Brenden & Amber Linendoll
neighbors.claims: Brenden Linendoll is a Deputy Sheriff with the Cochise County Sheriff's Office, having joined the department's public safety personnel retirement system in 2021 ([Cochise County Minutes](https://www.cochise.az.gov/AgendaCenter/ViewFile/Minutes/_07212021-102)). Amber Linendoll is also listed as an employee of the Cochise County Sheriff's Office ([Cochise County Roster](https://www.cochise.az.gov/DocumentCenter/View/10340/County-Phone-Roster-by-Last-Name-PDF)). The draft's previous claim regarding opposition to a commercial pet breeding facility could not be re-verified with available public records during this audit and has been removed to avoid inferring an energy stance from unrelated issues.
neighbors.influence_justification: Employees of Cochise County Sheriff's Office

approach_recommendations.engage: Connect via standard community channels, acknowledging their roles in law enforcement/public safety. Emphasize project commitments to traffic safety and security, ensuring the project poses no burden to local emergency services.

citations.claim: Brenden Linendoll is a Deputy Sheriff with the Cochise County Sheriff's Office...
citations.title: Cochise County PSPRS Board Minutes

citations.claim: Amber Linendoll is also listed as an employee of the Cochise County Sheriff's Office
citations.title: Cochise County Phone Roster

neighbors.name: Zane Daniel Ritenour
neighbors.claims: Zane Ritenour is the owner and qualifying party of B-J Drilling Company, Inc., a local water well drilling and pump service business based in Huachuca City and Benson ([BJ Drilling](https://bjdrilling.com/)). The business has operated in the area for over 45 years and holds a special use permit for its yard operations ([Letter to Neighbors](https://keepskylinerural.com/pdfs/BJ-Drilling-Letter.pdf)). He holds an active contractor's license for drilling and well services ([AZ ROC](https://roc.az.gov/sites/default/files/ROC_Posting-List_Residential_2025-12-11.csv)). While the draft noted a potential connection to 'ZR Cattle Company,' his primary verified commercial presence is the drilling company.
neighbors.influence_justification: Owner of established local drilling business

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach as a local business owner with deep knowledge of local water and land conditions. Emphasize groundwater protection and potential contracting opportunities for local service providers.

citations.claim: Zane Ritenour is the owner and qualifying party of B-J Drilling Company, Inc...
citations.title: BJ Drilling Company Website

citations.claim: ...holds a special use permit for its yard operations
citations.title: BJ Drilling Letter to Neighbors

citations.claim: He holds an active contractor's license...
citations.title: Arizona Registrar of Contractors Posting List

neighbors.name: Robert H. & Pamela J. Bangle
neighbors.claims: Robert H. Bangle is the owner of residential property at 557 W Oak St in Huachuca City, matching the provided parcel ID ([LoopNet](https://www.loopnet.com/property/557-w-oak-st-huachuca-city-az-85616/04003-10606013Z/)). Public records confirm his residency in the area ([National Public Data](https://nationalpublicdata.com/people/b/robert-bangle/)). No public statements regarding land use or development projects were found for the Bangle family.

approach_recommendations.engage: Proactively provide them with project information through a friendly, informal introduction. Since they have not been publicly active, ensure their questions or concerns are heard privately and addressed respectfully.
